newsitem.title: USA: First Union Real Estate names new CFO.
newsitem.headline: First Union Real Estate names new CFO.

text.p: First Union Real Estate Investments said it named Steven Edelman as its chief financial officer, effective immediately.
He replaces Jim Mastandrea, who had served as interim chief financial officer for the past year.
Edelman joined First Union in 1980. He was formerly the company's executive vice president and chief investment officer.
